name: Dice Catch!
description:
Controller:

  • Left stick/D-pad to move
  • A/X to use the fishing rod
  • B/Y to cancel

Keyboard:

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • Space/Enter to use the fishing rod
  • Shift/Escape to cancel
  • M to mute the music

Playing with audio is recommended!

Game made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
